parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower ball joint can cause the wheel to separate from the vehicle, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially fatal consequences.
Warped brake rotors can cause the vehicle to vibrate or pulse when braking, leading to reduced stopping power and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Vibrating or pulsing sensation when braking

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate repair of recalled components can lead to continued safety risks and potential accidents.
The failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash can lead to serious injury or fatality, as the occupants are not adequately protected.
symptoms: Airbags do not deploy in a crash
resulting in potential injury or harm to occupants.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: failure to stop or slow down
periodic failure to start the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Abnormal brake noise and vibration can be a sign of underlying issues, which if left unaddressed, can lead to brake failure and accidents.
symptoms: grinding or screeching sounds when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Vehicle Crash due to Brake Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can lead to loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
